data.name: Steve Ngo
data.bio: I'm Steve and I'm a software engineer, based in Atlanta Ga. I'm a former branding designer and camera specialist. I enjoy the feeling of fixing tough bugs in my code. The goals I have for myself include learning how to code more advanced programs while creating an appealing UX/UI. I enjoy working with my hands to fixing broken things like antique music boxes. Fun fact: my favorite book is Alice in Wonderland

data.name: Joseph 'Joey' Hernandez
data.bio: Hello there, my name is Joey, I go by Joey, so you can call me Joey. I am a budding software development engineer based in Seattle, WA. I am a professional brewer by trade and am making a shift to something more challenging. I am also a father to four kids, husband to one wife, and I like long walks in the woods. I really enjoy fixing problems in my code, and my goal is to become a great coder someday. In my spare time I like taking things apart, building computers, and tattoos, I love tattoos.
